name: 3-Split Strength
description: 3-Split, 5 Exercises, 12 sessions per block, 2 blocks. Ideal if you train 3x per week. Tracks 24 weeks of training. Emphasis on Strength

name: Full Body Intro
description: 1 Unique training day, 6 exercises, for 10 sessions. Ideal for full body programs without too much complexity. Beginner friendly.

name: 2-Split Hypertrophy
description: 2 Unique training days, 7 exercises, for 10 sessions. Great for adding variation! Fits well with 2-4 sessions per week.
